CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: Conical
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Features a rounded bullet, further improving accuracy and armour penetration.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: Gardiner
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Filled with high-explosives that detonate on impact for additional damage.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: Shaler
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Features a bullet that splits into 3 separate projectiles upon leaving the barrel.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: Hexagonal Bullet
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Features a hexagonal bullet made to engage perfectly with hexagonal rifling.
